home-service-market.name: Home Service Market
home-service-market.description: Hayes Valley's trusted neighborhood market since serving the Western Addition and Lower Haight communities. Located on Hayes Street near Divisadero, we offer an extensive selection of craft beer, California wines, premium spirits, and everyday essentials. Whether you're hosting a dinner party in Alamo Square or grabbing supplies before a show at The Fillmore, we're your one-stop shop.
home-service-market.headline: Hayes Valley Liquor & Market

hours.weekday: Mon-Thu: 9 AM - 9 PM, Fri: 9 AM - 10 PM
hours.weekend: Sat: 9 AM - 10 PM, Sun: 9 AM - 9 PM

faqs.question: What are your store hours?
faqs.answer: We're open Monday-Thursday 9 AM - 9 PM, Friday-Saturday 9 AM - 10 PM, and Sunday 9 AM - 9 PM.

faqs.question: Where are you located?
faqs.answer: We're at 1700 Hayes St in San Francisco's Hayes Valley neighborhood, near the corner of Hayes and Shrader, just a few blocks from Alamo Square Park.

faqs.question: Do you offer delivery?
faqs.answer: We don't currently offer delivery, but we're conveniently located with street parking available. Stop by and browse our full selection in-store!

faqs.question: Do you have a loyalty program?
faqs.answer: Yes, join our rewards program and earn points on every purchase. Sign up in-store.

faqs.question: Do you carry local craft beers?
faqs.answer: Yes! We have an extensive selection of San Francisco Bay Area craft beers including local favorites and rotate seasonal offerings.

reviews.name: Michael R.
reviews.text: Best selection in Hayes Valley. The staff really knows their stuff!

reviews.name: Sarah L.
reviews.text: Love this place! Great prices and they always have what I'm looking for.

reviews.name: David K.
reviews.text: Convenient location near Alamo Square. My go-to spot for wine.

town-country-market.name: Town Country Market
town-country-market.tagline: Nob Hill's premier wine & spirits destination
town-country-market.description: Serving San Francisco's prestigious Nob Hill and Union Square neighborhoods from our Post Street location. Steps from the historic Fairmont Hotel and cable car lines, we offer a curated selection of fine wines, premium spirits, and gourmet provisions. Perfect for hotel guests, theater-goers, and discerning locals seeking quality beverages in the heart of downtown San Francisco.
town-country-market.headline: Nob Hill Wine & Spirits

faqs.question: What are your store hours?
faqs.answer: We're open 7 days a week from 8 AM to 12 AM (midnight). Perfect for late-night needs!

faqs.question: Where are you located?
faqs.answer: We're at 600 Post St in San Francisco's Nob Hill neighborhood, just steps from Union Square and the historic Fairmont Hotel.

faqs.question: Do you offer delivery?
faqs.answer: We don't currently offer delivery, but our central downtown location makes us easy to reach. We're near several MUNI lines and the Powell Street cable car.

faqs.question: Can you help me select a wine for a special occasion?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Our knowledgeable staff is happy to help you find the perfect bottle for any occasion, from casual dinners to celebrations.

faqs.question: Do you carry imported wines and spirits?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have an excellent selection of imports from France, Italy, Japan, Scotland, and more, alongside premium California wines.

reviews.name: Jennifer M.
reviews.text: Great selection and open late! Perfect when staying at nearby hotels.

reviews.name: Robert T.
reviews.text: The staff recommendations are always spot-on. My go-to in Nob Hill.

reviews.name: Amanda H.
reviews.text: Convenient location near Union Square. Good prices for downtown.

mmc-wine-spirit.name: MMC Wine & Spirit
mmc-wine-spirit.tagline: Fine wines & premium spirits in Union Square
mmc-wine-spirit.description: Located on Sutter Street in the heart of San Francisco's Union Square district, MMC Wine & Spirit has been the destination for collectors and connoisseurs seeking rare wines and exceptional spirits. Walking distance from the Theater District, Chinatown, and luxury hotels, we specialize in hard-to-find Japanese whisky, single malt scotch, and boutique California wines. Our expert staff provides personalized recommendations for every palate and budget.
mmc-wine-spirit.headline: Union Square Fine Wines & Rare Spirits

hours.weekday: Mon: 10 AM - 11 PM, Tue: 10 AM - 10 PM, Wed-Thu: 10 AM - 11 PM, Fri: 10 AM - 12 AM
hours.weekend: Sat: 10 AM - 12 AM, Sun: 10 AM - 11 PM

faqs.question: What are your store hours?
faqs.answer: We're open Monday 10 AM - 11 PM, Tuesday 10 AM - 10 PM, Wednesday-Thursday 10 AM - 11 PM, Friday-Saturday 10 AM - 12 AM, and Sunday 10 AM - 11 PM.

faqs.question: Where are you located?
faqs.answer: We're at 615 Sutter St in San Francisco's Union Square district, between Mason and Taylor, walking distance from the Theater District and major hotels.

faqs.question: Do you offer delivery?
faqs.answer: We don't currently offer delivery. Visit us in-store to browse our extensive collection and get personalized recommendations from our expert staff.

faqs.question: Do you specialize in any particular spirits?
faqs.answer: We're known for our exceptional selection of single malt scotch, Japanese whisky, and small-batch bourbons. We also carry rare and allocated releases.

faqs.question: Can I pre-order rare bottles?
faqs.answer: Yes! We maintain a waitlist for allocated and rare releases. Call us at (415) 474-4951 or visit the store to be added to our list.

reviews.name: Thomas W.
reviews.text: The best whisky selection in Union Square. Staff is incredibly knowledgeable.

reviews.name: Lisa C.
reviews.text: Found a rare Japanese whisky I'd been hunting for months. This is my new favorite store!

reviews.name: James P.
reviews.text: Outstanding service and selection. Perfect location near our hotel.
